title: LLM Evaluation + GAN Implementation
description: Model evaluation metrics, benchmarking, GAN architecture, and generative model training

criteria.name: Correctness
criteria.description: Accurate evaluation metrics, functional GAN implementation, proper training loop.

excellent.description: All evaluation metrics correctly implemented. GAN trains successfully and generates realistic outputs. Training stability achieved.

good.description: Most metrics work correctly. GAN produces reasonable outputs. Minor training instability.

satisfactory.description: Basic metrics implemented. GAN partially functional. Significant training issues.

poor.description: Incorrect metrics. GAN fails to train or produces poor outputs. No convergence.

criteria.name: Code Quality
criteria.description: GAN architecture design, training code organization, metric implementation quality.

excellent.description: Excellent GAN architecture. Clean training loop with proper logging. Modular metric implementations. Good use of PyTorch/TensorFlow best practices.

good.description: Good GAN structure. Functional training code. Decent metric implementations. Follows most best practices.

satisfactory.description: Basic GAN implementation. Training code works but messy. Simple metric implementations.

poor.description: Poor GAN design. Disorganized training code. Broken or missing metrics.

criteria.name: Documentation
criteria.description: Evaluation methodology explanation, GAN architecture documentation, training process description.

excellent.description: Comprehensive evaluation methodology. GAN architecture clearly documented. Training process well-explained with hyperparameters justified.

good.description: Good evaluation documentation. GAN structure explained. Training process described.

satisfactory.description: Basic documentation. Key components explained. Limited training details.

poor.description: Minimal documentation. Architecture unexplained. No training details.

criteria.name: Creativity
criteria.description: Novel evaluation approaches, creative GAN architectures, innovative training techniques.

excellent.description: Innovative evaluation metrics. Creative GAN architecture or training techniques. Novel approaches to stability.

good.description: Interesting evaluation approaches. Good GAN variations. Some creative training techniques.

satisfactory.description: Standard metrics and architecture. Basic training approach. Minimal creativity.

poor.description: No creativity. Direct copying of tutorial code. No original contributions.

allowedTools: GitHub Copilot for syntax and boilerplate code
Stack Overflow for debugging GAN training issues
prohibited: Copy-pasting complete GAN implementations from AI tools
Using ChatGPT to write entire training loops
Submitting pre-trained models without actual training
aiUsagePolicy.guidelines: AI can help with syntax, but GAN architecture design and training implementation must show your understanding of generative models.

deliverables: Python file (practical4.py) with LLM evaluation metrics implementation
Training script with loss tracking and sample generation
Evaluation report comparing at least 2 LLM outputs using 3+ metrics
Generated samples from trained GAN model
README.md explaining architecture choices and training methodology
learningObjectives: Implement and understand LLM evaluation metrics (BLEU, ROUGE, perplexity, etc.)
Design and train a functional GAN architecture
Handle GAN training instabilities and mode collapse
Evaluate generative model quality and performance
